text: John Herrick McIntire (June 27, 1907 â€“ January 30, 1991) was an American character actor.Obituary Variety, February 4, 1991. McIntire was known for his roles as the second trail master, Christopher Hale in the television series Wagon Train and as Sheriff Al Chanbers in Psycho. McIntire died on January 30, 1991 from emphysema and lung cancer in Pasadena, California, aged 83. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1907 births Category:1991 deaths Category:Deaths from emphysema Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Spokane, Washington
title: John McIntire
